item.title: My Anaconda R environment
item.author: mikeskolnik75@gmail.com (Mike)
item.description: Using Jupyter Notebook with R by creating a new environment using Anaconda In this post I want to explain the R environment that I’ve created. I use Anaconda (available here) for my Python work, though these steps should be the same with MiniConda. Also, I’m doing this on Windows; commands and the look of the terminal prompt will be slightly different on Mac or Linux. Creating a new environment You can install the r-essentials package into your current Anaconda by running the following:
